import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar'; import './MonthlyReport.css'; import axios from 'axios'; function MonthlyReport() { const [workers, setWorkers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function getData() { await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/users/") .then(res => {setWorkers(res.data)}) .catch(err => {console.log(err)}) } getData(); }, []) return (
